title: Best of 2020:  Rev. Al Sharpton Interview, Stephen A. Smith Interview, Voting and more.
itunes:title: Best of 2020:  Rev. Al Sharpton Interview, Stephen A. Smith Interview, Voting and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big ups to Big Dog because STEVE on Watch, his show on Facebook is renewed for Season 2. Congrats!!! The Chief Love Officer does his best to help a man who is frustrated with women. Rev. Al Sharpton discusses the march on Washington that will take place today at the Lincoln Memorial. Stephen A. Smith shares with us everything we need to know about the boycott in the NBA. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has a recommendation on Netflix for us to watch and also continues to remind us that we are 67 days away from the biggest election of our lifetime. VOTE!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
